input_text:
Job Title: Regional Sales Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
ABOUT BIOTOUCH:BioTouch is a single-source, international specimen logistics partner spanning medical kit and supply distribution, printing, logistics, temperature control, and last-mile services. BioTouch’s solutions help eliminate silos and give laboratories and hospitals all the critical intelligence needed to create new efficiencies across the entire organization, allowing their customers to focus on what they do best: patient care. For further details visit www.biotouchglobal.com.
POSITION OVERVIEW: The role of Regional Sales Manager reports to the VP of Sales & Strategic Accounts and is an individual contributor role that drives new banner growth within the company. He/she is responsible for new business prospecting and lead generation, pipeline accuracy, new market/new banner penetration, contract introduction and negotiation, delivery of company revenue and profit goals each period, price integrity, proposal development, and delivering a compelling, value-oriented commercial position to the healthcare markets serviced by Path-Tec, a BioTouch Company. The Regional Sales Manager will drive growth of the pipeline and be responsible for bringing in a continuous stream of new banner prospects via cold-calling and marketing initiatives in close alignment with marketing, customer service, operations, and commercial leadership.
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:• Prospect new logo opportunities via cold-calling, social media, or other market relevant avenues• Manage pipeline accuracy in sales enablement tool with consistency• Drive Cross Selling initiatives with all customers and across all services in corporate portfolio• Forecast contract execution dates and update management timely and accurately• Representative for the company culture• Identify new market opportunities and advantages to effectively penetrate new markets/logos• Execute multi-year contracts that deliver significant revenue at profit levels within corporate expectations• Work closely with VP of Sales to develop, establish direct and distribution channel strategies and programs• Maintain key customer relationships and develop and implement strategies for expanding the company’s customer base • Other duties as assigned QUALIFICATIONS REQUIRED:• At least 7 years of sales experience in comparable industries Ability to cultivate new business opportunities consistently within the healthcare market• New business development skills and negotiation skills• Establish contacts and relationships with potential customers and channel partners• Outstanding consultative selling abilities and excellent interpersonal skills • Strong communication skills in both B2B interactions and with executive leadership within the company• Proven sales track record in a new product/new market environment• Work collaboratively with colleagues and staff to create a result driven environment• Experience with a specific sales methodology, sales funnel management• Effective communication skills with internal and external customers • Must be analytical and highly skilled with Excel• Must have experience with ERP systems• Ability to handle sensitive information

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Regional Sales Manager
output_json.summary: Responsible for driving new business growth, managing pipeline, and executing contracts within the healthcare market.
job_responsibilities: Prospect new logo opportunities via cold-calling, social media, or other market relevant avenues
Manage pipeline accuracy in sales enablement tool with consistency
Drive Cross Selling initiatives with all customers and across all services in corporate portfolio
Forecast contract execution dates and update management timely and accurately
Identify new market opportunities and advantages to effectively penetrate new markets/logos
Execute multi-year contracts that deliver significant revenue at profit levels within corporate expectations
Work closely with VP of Sales to develop, establish direct and distribution channel strategies and programs
Maintain key customer relationships and develop and implement strategies for expanding the company’s customer base
output_json.company_information: BioTouch is a single-source, international specimen logistics partner spanning medical kit and supply distribution, printing, logistics, temperature control, and last-mile services.
